response.overview: A beautiful woman sits on a chair in an abandoned building. She begins to tell three shocking stories about "sleep. ...... A "plastic surgery beauty" who has been making men pay for her beauty. Tonight, she is trying to make her target man fall in love with her. But when she wakes up from her sleep, a terrible thing awaits her. ...... The Night Before Marriage" A woman whose father was killed in a car accident a few years ago is on her way to the scene of the accident to report the news of her marriage. When she goes to the scene of the accident to report her marriage, her father appears in the car before she knows it. The father is so worried about his daughter that he decides to use her body to meet her fiancé. ...... Sleeping Sickness" An idol tries to release a video on the Internet that will make ghosts go away.
response.title: Akumu no Isu
